summary: An email from a Victim Specialist in the New York Field Office to an unidentified recipient, seeking assistance for a newly identified victim of Jeffrey Epstein located in Bellingham, Washington. The email demonstrates ongoing victim outreach and coordination efforts within the case.

persons.name: Victim Specialist New York Field Office
persons.context: The author of the email, identifying themselves as a Victim Specialist (VS) in New York, reaching out to coordinate assistance for a new victim.

events.title: Victim Specialist Outreach for New Victim
events.description: A Victim Specialist in New York emails an unidentified recipient to coordinate assistance for a newly identified victim of Jeffrey Epstein located in Bellingham, Washington.
personsInvolved: Victim Specialist New York Field Office

keyFacts: A Victim Specialist (VS) from the New York Field Office was actively identifying and coordinating assistance for new victims in the Epstein case as of September 2019.
A new victim was identified in Bellingham, Washington, indicating the geographic spread of victims being contacted.
The email shows internal coordination efforts among victim specialists to ensure victims in different jurisdictions receive appropriate support.
